trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality to restore the migration, or flow, of the execution context between threads.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade para restaurar a migração ou fluxo, de contexto de execução entre threads.

trans-unit.source: An execution context contains all execution-related information for a logical thread.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de execução contém todas as informações relacionadas com a execução de um thread lógico.

trans-unit.source: The flow of the execution context to other threads can be prevented by using the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which returns an AsyncFlowControl structure.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de contexto de execução para outros threads pode ser impedido ao utilizar o <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, que devolve uma estrutura de AsyncFlowControl.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> method of the returned AsyncFlowControl structure can be used to undo the flow suppression.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A>método da estrutura de devolvido AsyncFlowControl pode ser utilizado para anular a supressão de fluxo.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AsyncFlowControl structure must be used on the same thread on which it was created.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura de AsyncFlowControl tem de ser utilizada no mesmo thread em que foi criada.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pela instância atual do <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O `Dispose` método mantém o <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Após a chamada `Dispose`, tem de libertar todas as referências ao <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>foi occupying.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> </xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada `Dispose` antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is not used on the thread where it was created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura não é utilizada no thread onde foi criado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure has already been used to call Dispose or <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura já foi utilizada para chamar Dispose ou <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual a atual <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with the current structure.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto para a comparação com a estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: if obj is an structure and is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é um estrutura e é igual a atual estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is equal to the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura é igual a atual <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure to compare with the current structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura para comparar com a estrutura atual.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é igual a atual estrutura; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estruturas para determinar se estes são iguais.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as duas estruturas são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estruturas para determinar se estes não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as estruturas não são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the flow of the execution context between threads.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o fluxo de contexto de execução entre threads.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns an <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure that is used to restore the flow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método devolve um <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>estrutura é utilizada para restaurar o fluxo.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> </xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Undo method must be called only on the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure returned by its associated <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de anulação tem de ser chamado apenas no <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>estrutura devolvida pelo associado <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A> </xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is not used on the thread where it was created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura não é utilizada no thread onde foi criado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure has already been used to call <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*> or Undo.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> estrutura já foi utilizada para chamar <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*>ou anular.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*>
